name: 50 years
description: 50 Years is a fast-paced alternative to the bigger, longer turn-based strategy games. You can win or lose a game in a single evening. Either way you'll want to play it again.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2 GHc + Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
